about_the_game:
точный Ballistics, a prominent Russian ballistic manufacturer renowned for its precision, offers custom skins for provided weapons. In Zero Hour, they present the Serpentine Skin, featuring a distinctive serpent camouflage. This spray-painted design aids players to seamlessly blend into their surroundings, making their firearms harder to spot during combat. The Serpentine Skin mirrors the tactical finesse of a snake in the jungle, offering a visual representation of a vicious and stealthy approach to outsmarting opponents. Elevate your tactical presence with точный Ballistics' Serpentine Skin, designed to offer both functionality and an element of surprise on the battlefield.

This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

All skin brands are a fictional part of Zero Hour and does not represent any real or existing entities. Any resemblance to actual brands is purely coincidental. The purpose of using fictional brand names is solely for creative and illustrative purposes.

In Zero Hour, they present the Serpentine Skin, featuring a distinctive serpent camouflage. This spray-painted design aids players to seamlessly blend into their surroundings, making their firearms harder to spot during combat. The Serpentine Skin mirrors the tactical finesse of a snake in the jungle, offering a visual representation of a vicious and stealthy approach to outsmarting opponents. Elevate your tactical presence with точный Ballistics' Serpentine Skin, designed to offer both functionality and an element of surprise on the battlefield.

This skin can be applied to all available weapons in the game. To give you a better idea of how it will appear on your preferred weapons, you can preview these aesthetics within the in-game weapon customization menu.

All skin brands are a fictional part of Zero Hour and does not represent any real or existing entities. Any resemblance to actual brands is purely coincidental. The purpose of using fictional brand names is solely for creative and illustrative purposes.
